snippet: Empire Dreams beat Royal Posse by three-quarters of a length to win the $300,000 Empire Classic, the richest of the 11 races for New York-bred horses at Belmont Park.
lead_paragraph: Empire Dreams beat Royal Posse by three-quarters of a length to win the $300,000 Empire Classic, the richest of the 11 races for New York-bred horses at Belmont Park.
